==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 8.1.8
==Policy Statement==
Lock idle sessions.
==Policy Purpose==
Locking inactive sessions ensures that a passerby cannot use the credentials of the user who is currently logged in.
==Related Guidance==
* [[930f62d1-cce9-4277-b726-551ca551a275|Lock Idle Sessions]]
